WorkItem.Description:
RAWR 4.3.2 lists stat priority for Fury as Str > Mastery > Hit > Crit > Haste.  In checking with EJ, Landsoul, and target dummy testing it should be:
Str > Hit > Crit > Mastery >= Haste.   Couldn't find an option in RAWR to change the stat values
WorkItem.Summary: Mastery value too high for DPS Warrior
